Subsection.Text: At least 90 days before the end of a licensure cycle, the licensing authority shall:

Paragraph.Text: Forward a licensure renewal notification to an active or inactive licensee at the licensee’s last known address of record with the licensing authority.
Forward a notice of pending cancellation of licensure to a delinquent status licensee at the licensee’s last known address of record with the licensing authority.

Subsection.Text: Each licensure renewal notification and each notice of pending cancellation of licensure must state conspicuously that a licensee who remains on inactive status for more than 4 years and who wishes to reactivate the license may be required to demonstrate the competency to resume active practice by sitting for a special purpose examination or by completing other reactivation requirements, as defined by rule of the licensing authority.
This section shall apply only to licensees licensed under this part.
